property.name: Rules
property.value: When Auratouched Mage enters the battlefield, search your library for an Aura card that could enchant it. If Auratouched Mage is still on the battlefield, put that Aura card onto the battlefield attached to it. Otherwise, reveal the Aura card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Radiance - Choose a color. Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Truth shines even in darkness. Those who march on the side of truth walk always in righteous light."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although the door is flimsy and the lock pathetically small, Josuri's family never fears the night outside.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Through the haze of battle I saw the glint of sun on golden mane, the sheen of glory clad in mail, and I dropped my sword and wept at the idiocy of war." - Dravin, Gruul deserter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking or blocking creature this turn. If {R} was spent to cast this spell, Boros Fury-Shield deals damage to that creature's controller equal to the creature's power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, Sacrifice a creature: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The guilds each believe its way is right, but their ways only bring blood to Ravnica's streets and tears to Ravnica's families."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Prevent all damage that would be dealt by creatures this turn. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each upkeep, creatures you control gain flying until end of turn if a creature you control has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, landwalk, protection, trample, and vigilance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Equenauts are the seeds of the Conclave, scattered on the four winds, searching for new places to take root.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) When Conclave Phalanx enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 for each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov started using hawks as messengers in order to bypass the many toll roads and bridges that dot Ravnica. Soon the service became one of their most profitable businesses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Exile target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Into the light the good are welcomed, and with the light the evil are banished.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}, Sacrifice Divebomber Griffin: It deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Justice flies swiftly on angry wings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Dromad Purebred is dealt damage, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen much from the back of my dromad, most of it terribly wrong. The more I see, the more I am convinced of the rightness of my path." - Heruj, Selesnya initiate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant permanent When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everyone knows that violence at the Festival brings the worst of luck, so for at least one day a year arms are laid down in favor of brimming goblets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature {2}{W}{W}: Exile enchanted creature and all Auras attached to it. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, return the other cards exiled this way to the battlefield under their owners' control attached to that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have vigilance as long as Gate Hound is enchanted.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ditri, I leave this checkpoint in your capable teeth." - Kitov, nightguard patrol

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals half that damage, rounded down, to that permanent or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ma said we should offer up blini-cakes and salt to the good ones, but I get that chill up my spine and just shut the door." - Otak, Tin Street shopkeep

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Destroy all nontoken creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ravnica, like a hedge, must be pruned, leaving only leaves of verdant uniformity." - Niszka, Selesnya evangel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Hunted Lammasu enters the battlefield, target opponent creates a 4/4 black Horror creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lammasu ruled the velds before the city grew. Now they roam Ravnica's skies, but their ancient enemies have not forgotten them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Radiance - Destroy target enchantment and each other enchantment that shares a color with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The magic of the Boros patrols the streets even when their soldiers do not.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control by sources you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Legion looks after its own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gatekeepers are so fastidious that even the winds must wait to pass.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Wojek defend the laws. We defend the people."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Other creatures you control get +0/+2 and have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The town stands on his ancestors' former burial grounds. Even with the graves long gone, he continues his determined vigil.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap three untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It drifts through the streets as a breeze of collective sighs, wilting the bustle with dreams and heavy eyelids.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}: Target creature can't block Screeching Griffin this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They were master fishers, but their seas are now the streets and their catch, the goblins that run pell-mell from the screeching in the sky.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If {G} was spent to cast this spell, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you ask me, those root-lovers value mindless dogma over progress." - Trivaz, Izzet mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Activated abilities cost {2} more to activate unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most feared of Azorius punishments is to be freed - sent back out into the world, stripped of all magical defenses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to three Aura cards with different names, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Choose one to heal, one to harm, and one to grant you the prudence to use them." - Miotri, auratouched mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature token leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Twilight Drover. {2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Twilight Drover: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me a sword and I'll kill a few enemies. But give me a hammer and a fiery forge, and I'll turn the tide of battle."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An ageless order, the votaries receive the gift of rejuvenation from the temple gardens they guard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Radiance - {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A few arrows aren't enough to pierce your faith, soldier. You'll be back on the battlefield by sun's dawn."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Radiance - Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the call to arms, the call to fury, the call to blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a source deals damage to Belltower Sphinx, that source's controller mills that many cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {U}: Cerulean Sphinx's owner shuffles it into their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "About the sphinx, I have mixed feelings. Their wisdom I crave, but their secrecy I can't tolerate." - Szadek

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The words came to the sorcerer's lips but refused to budge any further.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Copy Enchantment enter the battlefield as a copy of any enchantment on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simic mages create redundant backups of their experiments to reduce the consequences of catastrophe.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Drake Familiar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an enchantment to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Falconry? A fine sport I suppose, if you're attracted to the frailty of birds." - Trivaz, Izzet mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant permanent You can't choose an untapped permanent as this spell's target as you cast it. You control enchanted permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tendrils of sorcery find easy purchase on the soft underbelly of dreams.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery card, exile it. Then that player copies each instant or sorcery card exiled with Eye of the Storm. For each copy, the player may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Flight of Fancy enters the battlefield, draw two cards. Enchanted creature has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The view from above is an inspiration to the newly winged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each Island you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A system to direct the flow of Ravnica's entire water supply? Thinking a bit small, aren't we?" - Trivaz, Izzet mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Æther can turn a footprint into a blueprint.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each tooth carries enough bacteria to kill a person in a day or two. But then, gharials do have 138 teeth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Grozoth enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards that have mana value 9, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. {4}: Grozoth loses defender until end of turn. Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a creature spell, Halcyon Glaze becomes a 4/4 Illusion creature with flying in addition to its other types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Earth to æther, window to wonder, stillness to the sky." - Glazing incantation

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hunted Phantasm can't be blocked. When Hunted Phantasm enters the battlefield, target opponent creates five 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If {B} was spent to cast this spell, that spell's controller mills X cards, where X is the spell's mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Each player draws a card, then discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lies are sold as often as truths - and used just as effectively.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, return enchanted creature and all Auras attached to that creature to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tharashk the Bold suddenly wasn't himself. Or anyone else, for that matter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player shuffles their graveyard into their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: True enlightenment comes not with a new thought, but with understanding of all the old ones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When House Dimir's secrets are in danger of exposure, the guild takes drastic measures to cover its tracks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most Ravnicans lead lives of desperate survival. Those who thrive are malleable enough to change with the ever-shifting politics of the guilds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Well, at least all of that arm-waving and arcane babbling you did was impressive."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The irritable drakes are solitary nesters. Even brooding females barely contain the urge to attack their own young.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Spawnbroker enters the battlefield, you may exchange control of target creature you control and target creature with power less than or equal to that creature's power an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The trick isn't setting up the bad trade. It's making each side think it got the better deal."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. {3}{U}: Attach Stasis Cell to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Simic created the cells to preserve their experiments. The Azorius put the cells to use on the guilty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Surveilling Sprite dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their natural curiosity, combined with a knack for trespassing, makes sprites excellent spies.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Drakes embody the worst of Ravnica: great potential, twisted by selfishness and greed." - Razia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mastery is achieved when "telling time" becomes "telling time what to do."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: Choose a basic land type. Each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This feels a little more like home."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {4}: Tidewater Minion loses defender until end of turn. {T}: Untap target permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a card name. Target player reveals cards from the top of their library until a card with that name is revealed. If it is, that player puts the rest of the revealed cards into their graveyard and puts the card with the chosen name on top of their library. Otherwise, the player shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Vedalken Dismisser enters the battlefield, put target creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I crept up on him, quiet as a guttermouse. And then suddenly I found myself facedown in a latrine pit behind Tin Street Market." - Sirislav, Dimir spy

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their denial reaches far into your future.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be careful what information you ask them to find, for it will likely be the subject of tale time at the alehouse." - Sirislav, Dimir spy

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Zephyr Spirit blocks, return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A spiteful force exists on Ravnica that binds these ghosts to the land of the living but forbids them to touch it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Noncreature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, counter that spell unless you sacrifice a creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature that isn't enchanted. It can't be regenerated. Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 1 life: Carrion Howler gets +2/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They chase tirelessly after the bone-carts that speed along the streets of the Plague Quarter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's an experience worse than blindness - it's the certainty that your vision is perfect and the horror that there's no world around you to see.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Dimir House Guard. Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of target player's library. Exile any number of those cards, then put the rest back in any order. Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with mana value X.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We thought we found the victim's clothes lumped in the street. As it turned out, it was the victim, insides sucked out - just a sack of skin and robes." - Agrus Kos

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player returns all creature cards from their graveyard to their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the dead are laid to rest in Ravnica, it's usually just a nap.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Golgari Thug dies, put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. Dredge 4 (If you would draw a card, you may mill four cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, untap Helldozer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes you go to hell, and sometimes hell comes to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When killing five just isn't enough.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Hunted Horror enters the battlefield, target opponent creates two 3/3 green Centaur creature tokens with protection from black.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Infectious Host dies, target player loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lost man, dead man, knocking on the door. Cankerman, soreman, knock no more." - Ravnican children's rhyme

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Keening Banshee enters the battlefield, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her cold wail echoes in the alleys and under-eaves, finding the unfortunate and turning their blood to ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Allow me a moment to catch your breath."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mausoleum Turnkey enters the battlefield, return target creature card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When he reaches for his key ring, you should be running for the exit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of your library. For each card, put that card into your graveyard unless you pay 2 life. Then put the rest into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At every fifth full moon, the Moon Market convenes to peddle Ravnica's most forbidden wares.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}: All creatures able to block Mortipede this turn do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mortipede pheromones choke the streets with sickly sweetness, luring the rash and unwary into its waiting jaws.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Necroplasm. At the beginning of your end step, destroy each creature with mana value equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on Necroplasm. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, you may mill two cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Netherborn Phalanx enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life for each creature they control. Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, you may mill two cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ribbons of Night deals 4 damage to target creature and you gain 4 life. If {U} was spent to cast this spell, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My favorite meal is angel's flesh, slain in agony and iced with black vinegar." - Aszala of House Dimir

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}: Roofstalker Wight gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No heartbeat to hear, no greed to bribe, no fear of death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sadistic Augermage dies, each player puts a card from their hand on top of their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Sacrifice Sewerdreg: Exile target card from a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They hardly have form, dripping through pipe and grate with the slip and stench of flowing sewage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile up to four target cards from a single graveyard. Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. Exile Sins of the Past.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, you may mill five cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Strands of Undeath enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards. {B}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why limit yourself to mortal law when you can outlive those who enforce it?" - Czaric, Orzhov prelate

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Look at the top two cards of target opponent's library, then exile one of them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once the brew gets the brains nice and pickled, they're a lot easier to pick through."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) {B}: Undercity Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Officially, there's nothing under that bridge to hunt . . . Unofficially, my torchers are too terrified to go there after nightfall." - Agrus Kos

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If {G} was spent to cast this spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After fear and weakness rot away, that which remains is stronger than its living form.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Vindictive Mob enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature. Vindictive Mob can't be blocked by Saprolings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature. If the player can't, sacrifice Woebringer Demon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each soul he devours adds its hunger to his own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice Barbarian Riftcutter: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Riftcutters are suicidal anarchists, waving those lightning axes around so much that the walls are as likely to fall as their foes." - Heruj, Selesnya initiate

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}, Sacrifice Blockbuster: It deals 3 damage to each tapped creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vendors hung cords heavy with roots and laid out boxes of salted meat, unaware of the fiery disaster swiftly approaching.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature you control When enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it and attach Breath of Fury to a creature you control. If you do, untap all creatures you control and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Char deals 4 damage to any target and 2 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Izzet mages often acquire their magic reagents from dubious sources, so the potency of their spells is never predictable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Radiance - Cleansing Beam deals 2 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Justice is toothless without punishment. Righteousness cannot succeed without the suffering of the guilty." - Razia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Coalhauler Swine is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing stops industry in Ravnica - certainly not the safety of its workers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dogpile deals damage to any target equal to the number of attacking creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no shelter from this storm, its rain of fists, or the thunderous cackles of bloodlust.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Damage that would be dealt by Excruciator can't be prevented.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Though used as a piercing weapon, the tusk is more akin to a stinger, spreading pain instantly throughout the body of its victim. This specimen deserves further study." - Simic research notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Fiery Conclusion deals 5 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Boros legionnaire saw a noble sacrifice, the Rakdos thug a blazing suicide, and the Izzet alchemist an experiment gone awry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, permanents you control gain "{T}: This permanent deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A single item acting as lantern and lance? Now that's military efficiency." - Brev Grezar, Boros lieutenant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. If {W} was spent to cast this spell, the creature gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, you gain that much life" until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Galvanic Arc enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target. Enchanted creature has first strike.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Goblin Fire Fiend must be blocked if able. {R}: Goblin Fire Fiend gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chimney sweeps, explorers of abandoned buildings, spire climbers . . . goblin spelunkers have found countless niches within Ravnica's metropolis.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}: Greater Forgeling gets +3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few have seen the inner workings of Ravnica's furnaces, but neighboring districts catch brief glimpses in the horrors that escape the flames.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Hammerfist Giant deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh sure, they buy a lot of ale, but I always find myself needing to rebuild after the giants have paid a visit." - Belko, owner of Titan's Keg tavern

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste When Hunted Dragon enters the battlefield, target opponent creates three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The knights see a mighty quarry. The dragon sees breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Radiance - Until end of turn, target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain "This creature can't block."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Boros say they want to bring order to Ravnica. Funny then, how well they use chaos." - Trigori, Azorius senator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that Indentured Oaf would deal to red creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All it knows is the difference between friend and food.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this creature unless it attacked this turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Rakdos know little of technology, but they definitely know how to push buttons." - Trivaz, Izzet mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell, put the cards in your hand on the bottom of your library in any order, then draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My criticism of the Izzet is that their impulse for learning seems too much like impulse and too little like learning." - Trigori, Azorius senator

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Molten Sentry enters the battlefield, flip a coin. If the coin comes up heads, Molten Sentry enters the battlefield as a 5/2 creature with haste. If it comes up tails, Molten Sentry enters the battlefield as a 2/5 creature with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some take after their father, Stone, some after their mother, Fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Ordruun Commando this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thick of muscle, stout of heart, and possessing a burning love of justice and the battlefield, the Ordruun minotaurs are the foundation of the Boros Legion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rain of Embers deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's plenty to talk about in the marketplaces of Ravnica, be it the latest feud between guilds or the terrible weather.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Change the target of target activated ability with a single target. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Three hundred years of practice thwarted by an instant of mischief.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sabertooth Alley Cat attacks each combat if able. {1}{R}: Creatures without defender can't block Sabertooth Alley Cat this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has eight lives' worth of hunger to satisfy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Natural disasters in Ravnica are largely nullified by the Izzet. Unnatural disasters, on the other hand, happen all of the time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sell-Sword Brute dies, it deals 2 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Killing is easy. Just wrap your hand around the haft, and wrap your enemy around the blade."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ravnica's laws protect not its citizens but its industry. Aging equipment is destroyed rather than restored, to bring more money into the factories' coffers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sparkmage Apprentice enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pajik was amazed and pleased at his newfound powers. His pet cat Rivin was slightly less enthusiastic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's end step, that player sacrifices an untapped land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no place in Ravnica for stagnation, no room for lands unfilled and untilled.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Radiance - Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If only my poxes were as infectious as their zealotry." - Savra

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Sacrifice three lands: Torpid Moloch loses defender until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Market hucksters sell molochs for use as watchdogs. Of course, that's all molochs do. Sit around . . . and watch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Viashino Fangtail deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the bony terminus gets too large, it's shed from the tail in coinciding periods of heightened aggression and hunger." - Simic research notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Viashino Slasher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Citizens of Ravnica stick to the main streets. Shortcuts may look tempting, but down each alley, dozens of hungry hands await, and screams do not carry into the busy market throng.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player shuffles all permanents they own into their library, then reveals that many cards from the top of their library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice War-Torch Goblin: It deals 2 damage to target blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In a town shaped by the subtle machinations and political intrigue of its guilds, it's reassuring to see a goblin waving his torch and screaming about some nonsense or other." - Agrus Kos

property.name: Rules
property.value: Radiance - {T}: Wojek Embermage deals 1 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your brother's crimes are your crimes. You stood by and lent support, so you too must face judgment."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Long ago, birds of paradise littered the skies. Thanks to the city's sprawl, most now exist as pets of society's elite.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Bramble Elemental, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ravnica is a seamless urban tapestry, each city bleeding into the next. In abandoned corners, however, nature has begun to reclaim what it once owned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Carven Caryatid enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: So-called "old wood" is rare in deforested Ravnica. Statues carved from it are said to house the last of the ancient nature spirits.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Civic Wayfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These alleys are not safe. Come, I can guide you back to the market square."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He combs the streets looking for the lost light, the discarded enigmas of the city.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. If {W} was spent to cast this spell, untap all creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I awoke to the face of beauty, my body fully healed. In that moment I knew my destiny was the Conclave's to shape." - Rogad, Selesnya initiate

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {B}. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cast out of the Conclave generations ago, these elves found a home in the corrupted districts of the Golgari.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spires of Ravnica are no different from the tall trees of other planes. The elves navigate and protect them just the same.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Fists of Ironwood enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens. Enchanted creature has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Saprolings add the three and the four to the "one-two punch."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Golgari Brownscale is put into your hand from your graveyard, you gain 2 life. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, you may mill two cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Golgari Grave-Troll enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Golgari Grave-Troll: Regenerate Golgari Grave-Troll. Dredge 6 (If you would draw a card, you may mill six cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The glittering strands of its complex web catch everything from a buzzing gnat to a passing bloatdrake.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Hunted Troll enters the battlefield, target opponent creates four 1/1 blue Faerie creature tokens with flying. {G}: Regenerate Hunted Troll.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her ivy locks are a remnant of the wooded wilds now lost to Ravnica forever.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, you may mill two cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap four untapped creatures you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shepherds work in secret, seeking out abominations against nature and returning them to earth and dust.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the song of Selesnya be heard above the rhythm of our thundering hordes"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a land card with a basic land type, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is the place? This map has got to be wrong . . . ." - Svania Trul, wayfinder novice, last words

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For each creature that arrives in its audience, the sage imparts another piece of ancient wisdom for all to hear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bones of the past will tell their tales - if you know how to speak their language." - Savra

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. If {B} was spent to cast this spell, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shadow that fell over the grove was silent yet horribly alive, roiling with millions of tiny minions dedicated to the process of rot.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Tap two untapped creatures you control: Root-Kin Ally gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the seeds of faith, great forests grow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scion of the Wild's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has a hundred thousand extinctions to avenge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Rubblefield was once among the wealthiest districts in Ravnica. All it took was a single wurm to reduce it to ruins.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, untap Stone-Seeder Hierophant. {T}: Untap target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her touch brings to bare stone what water and sun bring to rich soil.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries of wind, rain, and roots compressed into an instant of destruction: such is the power of Selesnya.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, Sacrifice Transluminant: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forget yourself. Forget your city. Forget your homes, your families, the debts and obligations that hold you to this world."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}: Trophy Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature with flying. Whenever a creature with flying dealt damage by Trophy Hunter this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Trophy Hunter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A friendly ursapine means a constant supply of sharp spears. An unfriendly one means a constant supply of small holes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Vinelasher Kudzu.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran attacks, attacking red creatures get +2/+0 and attacking white creatures get +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lieutenant Kos has never met a group of recruits he could not inspire or a mob he could not quell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The trainer awoke to begin the journey from the wurm's tail to its head. The sun was setting when she arrived.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a creature spell, each player returns all cards with the same name as that spell from their graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Golgari support a vast army because death never ends its soldiers' service.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Boros Legion attacks, swiftblades enter the fray first. They pick off the archers and mages, softening the enemy front before the flame-kin and giants go in.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Radiance - Brightflame deals X damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the pyres of the unbelievers light our way." - Razia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.) As an additional cost to cast creature spells, you may pay any amount of mana. If you do, that creature enters the battlefield with that many additional +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are many, yet one. We are separate in body, yet speak with a single voice. Join us in our chorus."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a blue spell, exile the top card of target player's library. Whenever you cast a black spell, exile the top card of target player's library. Your opponents can't cast spells with the same name as a card exiled with Circu, Dimir Lobotomist.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 3 life. Transmute {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to three creature cards, reveal them, then shuffle and put those cards on top in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is fitting that we meet in the first hour of light, for we are called by the Conclave to pierce a threat of darkness."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target player draws two cards. • Target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dimir rank and file never see nor hear their guildmaster. All orders are given through mysterious necrosages who appear from the shadows, tersely toss out a command, and then melt into the darkness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a Forest: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The soil here is rich with the rotting dead, and the sun's fingers barely penetrate the dark canopy. Plant our brethren here. This shall be our sanctuary." - Savra

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Dimir Cutpurse deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Other guilds demand tolls from those who travel their territories, but not House Dimir. It takes its share secretly, one coin purse at a time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Dimir Doppelganger becomes a copy of that card, except it has this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fear not. Your life will not go unlived."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dimir Infiltrator can't be blocked. Transmute {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Golgari expand, yes, but I refuse to call their tainted creations ‘growth.'" - Veszka, Selesnya evangel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike At the beginning of your upkeep, if Firemane Angel is in your graveyard or on the battlefield, you may gain 1 life. {6}{R}{R}{W}{W}: Return Firemane Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Flame-Kin Zealot enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Boros soldiers are like a cache of bombs ready to explode, and the flame-kin light their fuses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact or creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The righteous light of Selesnya is channeled through the devout, striking out to blind the nonbelievers.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am confident that if anyone actually penetrates our facades, even the most perceptive would still be fundamentally unprepared for the truth of House Dimir." - Szadek

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Golgari don't bury their dead. They plant them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like corpse-worms through a carapace, rotwurms slide through the hollowed bones of the undercity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice Grave-Shell Scarab: Draw a card. Dredge 1 (If you would draw a card, you may mill a card instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It stands sentinel to the great City-Tree, home of the Selesnya Conclave.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Loxodon Hierarch enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. {G}{W}, Sacrifice Loxodon Hierarch: Regenerate each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have lived long, and I remember how this city once was. If my death serves to bring back the Ravnica in my memory, then so be it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Mindleech Mass deals combat damage to a player, you may look at that player's hand. If you do, you may cast a spell from among those cards without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Touched by moroii" - Undercity slang meaning "to grow old"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller discards their hand. Transmute {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: If damage would be dealt to Phytohydra, put that many +1/+1 counters on it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look at this creature, so like the Conclave it serves. Cut one head and it grows two. Damage it and it flourishes." - Veszka, Selesnya evangel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player mills X cards and you gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gold can be reearned, goods restored. The moroii steal youth, more precious than either, and once gone, it's gone forever." - Berta Suszat, civic healer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All matter, animate or not, rots when exposed to time. We merely speed up the process." - Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Radiance - Untap target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it. Those creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Yuri took up the ragged Boros banner, and his brethren, inspired by the act, followed him back into the fight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance, haste {T}: The next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature you control this turn is dealt to another target creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her sword burns with such brightness that foes avert their eyes and arrows divert their paths.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses three permanents they control, then sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the chosen ones are spared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you sacrifice a black creature, you may pay 2 life. If you do, each other player sacrifices a creature. Whenever you sacrifice a green creature, you may gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature's most raw beauty is the circle: perfect in its continuance, with no break between death and life."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, Searing Meditation deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When I meditate I see the world as it should be. All that does not fit, I remove." - Alovnek, Boros guildmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beneath the beauty of light and seed is the might of Vitu-Ghazi.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The clamor of the city drowns all voices. But together we can sing a harmony that will resonate from Ravnica's tallest spires to her deepest wells."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Selesnya Sagittars can block an additional creature each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What's their strike range, you ask? Let's put it this way: sagittars aim their bows using maps." - Otak, Tin Street shopkeep

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Shambling Shell: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Target creature blocks Sisters of Stone Death this turn if able. {B}{G}: Exile target creature blocking or blocked by Sisters of Stone Death. {2}{B}: Put a creature card exiled with Sisters of Stone Death onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not know which gives me more pride: the legions of soldiers marching in thunderous lockstep, or the cry of the skyknights riding their rocs like jagged lightning overhead." - Razia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Sunhome Enforcer deals combat damage, you gain that much life. {1}{R}: Sunhome Enforcer gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Law soothed his savage heart. Where fury once burned, the enduring flame of order now shines." - Razia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying If Szadek, Lord of Secrets would deal combat damage to a player, instead put that many +1/+1 counters on Szadek and that player mills that many cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hear that? Those notes mean we've arrived at Sunhome Let our allies' hearts soar and our enemies' hearts shatter at the sound" - Klattic, Boros legionnaire

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other green creatures you control get +1/+1. Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Create Voja, a legendary 2/2 green and white Wolf creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player sacrifices a creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Otiev's mind, he ruled in favor of the accused. But in his courtroom he was only a spectator, watching his hand deliver the sign of death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Vulturous Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When something dies, all things benefit. Well okay, just our things." - Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only in Ravnica do the wolves watch the flock.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}{G}, {T}: Target Forest becomes a 4/4 black and green Elemental Horror creature. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Its darkened sap penetrates natural fibers and spreads its own genes. Emulation experiments are underway." - Simic research notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Regenerate Woodwraith Strangler.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing could be more natural than roots sucking nourishment from the dead." - Savra

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. {1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({RW} can be paid with either {R} or {W}.) First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look at this goblin, once wild, untamed, and full of idiocy. The Boros have given him the skill of a soldier and focused his heart with a single cause." - Razia

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({GW} can be paid with either {G} or {W}.) When Centaur Safeguard dies, you may gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Swift, strong, and selfless, the centaurs are the shields of the Conclave.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({UB} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.) {3}{U}: Target player draws a card. Activate only as a sorcery. {3}{B}: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({BG} can be paid with either {B} or {G}.) Regenerate target creature. At this turn's next end of combat, destroy all creatures that blocked or were blocked by it this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the dead give way to the mineral gaze of the gorgon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({BG} can be paid with either {B} or {G}.) Trample At the beginning of your end step, return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. {4}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({UB} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.) {2}, {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the undercity, forgetfulness is often encouraged at the point of a blade.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only before attackers are declared. You choose which creatures attack this turn. You choose which creatures block this turn and how those creatures block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({GW} can be paid with either {G} or {W}.) Other permanents you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. {3}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({UB} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.) Players can't search libraries this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Put a blood counter on Bloodletter Quill: Draw a card, then you lose 1 life for each blood counter on Bloodletter Quill. {U}{B}: Remove a blood counter from Bloodletter Quill.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size - a weight of strength and of pride." - Agrus Kos

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, exile all cards from your hand face down. At the beginning of your upkeep, return all cards you own exiled with Bottled Cloister to your hand, then draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nonartifact permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may return another permanent you control that shares a permanent type with it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It wants to remain a mystery, banishing the curious in favor of less inquisitive company.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play with the top card of your library revealed. As long as the top card of your library is a creature card, creatures you control that share a color with that card get +1/+1. {G}{W}: Put the top card of your library on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature, then return Cyclopean Snare to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spoiled, gluttonous halls of the Orzhov teem with gaudy, needless wealth. Even their security measures are made for beauty first, efficiency second.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members - and the doomed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Izzet artificers have learned to steer their beautiful constructs clear of Boros warhammers - and the opera house.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash As Grifter's Blade enters the battlefield, choose a creature you control it could be attached to. If you do, it enters the battlefield attached to that creature. Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Equip {1}

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {T}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One man's trash is another man's troller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a card from your hand on top of your library: Return Leashling to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever the first noncreature spell of a turn is cast, counter that spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nullstone absorbs and dampens most forms of magical energy, as well as light, sound, and heat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to equipped creature instead. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To bear the shield of the pariah is the highest honor a Boros can receive - and the last.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has defender, flying, and first strike. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mask confers both the prowess of a falcon and its loyalty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a plague counter on Plague Boiler. {1}{B}{G}: Put a plague counter on Plague Boiler or remove a plague counter from it. When Plague Boiler has three or more plague counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, destroy all nonland permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Choose a player. That player adds one mana of any color they choose.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first searchlights were given as gifts, symbols of cooperation, to the emissaries present at the signing of the Guildpact.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Terrarion enters the battlefield tapped. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Terrarion: Add two mana in any combination of colors. When Terrarion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, Sacrifice Voyager Staff: Exile target creature. Return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Voyager staffs are sought by those hoping to find an escape from the sprawling glut of Ravnica.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped. When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped. When Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {U}{B}, {T}: Target player mills a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a space where there is no room, in a structure that was never built, meets the guild that doesn't exist.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped. When Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {B} or {G}.) As Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {R} or {W}.) As Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped. When Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}{W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {2}{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sunhome - the stalwart shield, the towering sentinel, the seat of justice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {3}{B}{G}: Until end of turn, Svogthos, the Restless Tomb becomes a black and green Plant Zombie creature with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard." It's still a land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {G} or {W}.) As Temple Garden enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {2}{G}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the autumn, she casts her seeds across the streets below, and come spring, her children rise in service to the Conclave.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
